alert.note: Alert for Caroline; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; King William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 7:15PM EDT until August 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... The City of Richmond in central Virginia... Southeastern Goochland County in central Virginia... South central Caroline County in north central Virginia... Northwestern Henrico County in central Virginia... Central Hanover County in central Virginia... Northwestern King William County in east central Virginia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 715 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wyndham, or 7 miles northwest of Tuckahoe, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wyndham around 720 PM EDT. Glen Allen around 725 PM EDT. Ashland and Randolph Macon College around 730 PM EDT. Hanover around 745 PM EDT. Dawn around 750 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Enfield, Hanover Airport, Gum Tree, Johnsons Springs, Doswell, Elmont, Etna Mills, Short Pump, Longdale, and Rockville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; King William
